title: Onion
description: A round yellow onion. Can be used to talk about cooking, eating, or crying. Sometimes used in metaphors about layers. Might also be used in computing contexts in reference to onion routing.
apple_vendor_description: Appleâ€™s onion emoji presents a perfectly spherical bulb with distinct, layered skin rendered in earthy brown and tan hues. The realistic lighting and subtle gloss on its surface, characteristic of Apple's 3D design, give it a fresh, organic appearance, while soft rounded edges make it inviting. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, is a clear and vibrant symbol for cooking, ingredients, and healthy eating, adding a touch of culinary flair to messages.
